summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6710 for the improvement of Broadway, on the east side only, from East Pine Street to East Denny Way; and certain other streets and an avenue, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 107910 to revise the maximum interest payable on local improvement bonds.
